summary: Based on the provided documents, there is no mention of Edwin Juan Lopez. The documents primarily concern HSCA staff payroll records and related administrative matters. They include Final Determination Notifications from the Assassination Records Review Board regarding the postponement of Social Security numbers in HSCA staff payroll records, payroll authorization forms, and memoranda related to HSCA staff members such as Mark T. Flanagan, Dan L. Hardway, and Leslie H. Wizelman. The documents span from 1977 to 1995 and focus on the administrative aspects of HSCA staff management.
significance: Since Edwin Juan Lopez is not mentioned in the provided documents, their significance in the JFK assassination context cannot be determined.
